Ladies and gentlemen, today is the 15th of the lunar month, Tet
Nguyen Tieu, the first full moon night
of the lunar new year and an
important holiday in the spiritual life
of Vietnamese people.  People from all regions
come to Chim Bai Dan Huong Pagoda to commemorate
their ancestors and pray for
good things for their families in the new year.
This is also one of the
most important holidays for the Vietnamese community.
Chinese people in Ho Chi Minh City,
Tet Nguyen Tieu activities
took place enthusiastically in many places, including District
11, which held the
Tet Nguyen
Tieu festival for the first time on Ha Ton Quyen Street. Since early
this morning, hundreds of people have attended.  Coming to the
festival, the street is bustling with
stalls selling typical dishes.
Besides the culinary space, people also
have the opportunity to experience many entertainment activities
such as the folk game of asking for
calligraphy from the people.  excited with the
special Lion and Dragon performances which
are believed to help dispel all bad luck
of the Old Year and bring good luck and fortune for the
New Year. On this occasion, about 90 gifts
were given to the Chinese people.
In difficult circumstances, we also
believe that there should be a festival activity
with traditional cultural characteristics to
give people a new atmosphere,
a new vitality to continue
production and business.  Tonight, the
2024 Spring Festival will also
open at the District 5 Cultural Center. The
Chinese Lantern Festival in District 5
is a national intangible cultural heritage
and is one of the events.

harvests in addition to the rest.  The ceremony also has
many other cultural, artistic and

weekend in warm weather conditions,
so it was  attracting a large number of tourists from all over the world.

Family deforestation in
Gia Lai border area is getting more and more
serious, forest area is decreasing every
year, recently Gia Lai province authorities
discovered a large-scale deforestation case
in Chu district.  Pron deforestation subjects
not only exploit on a small scale but also
organize into groups ready to resist
when being
arrested. On the 30th of Tet, February 9,
more than 30 subjects brought eight agricultural vehicles
to infiltrate sub-area 1003.  belonging to
Lamo protective forest, sawed down hundreds of

stopped these subjects, they had words of

then left the scene. The force
also requested  The subjects stopped and
acted. However, the subjects also

Tet duty, so the force was about C, about 10
people, but the subjects were up to thirty or
nearly 40 people, so the subjects also
Not complying with the request of the
authorities, the authorities
determined that 165 forest trees were cut down,
mainly oil trees with diameters from 16 to 40 cm. The
total volume of damaged wood was about 50 m3,
nearly half of the total.  Among these, the
subjects were transported out of the
initial mining site. The group of subjects was initially identified as
people in Lapia commune, Chong district. The

Australia is facing one
of its worst bushfire seasons
since the 2019 disaster  2019 2020
February 203 Firefighters
battled to contain a bushfire in
Victoria state as thousands of residents
were urged to evacuate areas
threatened by a fire that broke out in a fishing area.  The
capital Melb, about 2 hours drive
northwest, has spread beyond control,
destroying about 11,000 hectares of forest and
farmland, causing damage to property and
livestock. Nearly 1,000 soldiers and more than 50
water-dropping aircraft  Large-scale firefighting
equipment was deployed to extinguish the blaze. Authorities also
urged thousands of people from 28
rural communities around the area to evacuate. At
least two schools were forced to close
and about 5,000 homes lost power across the area.
Victoria Fire and Rescue are
having difficulty determining the
cause of the fire due to adverse weather conditions
and the fire is yet to be brought under control.
A cold front off the coast of
southern Australia is forecast to move in.  to
areas in the east that are

overturned last night a fabric warehouse  located in an alley in
Binh Tan district, Ho Chi Minh city,
suddenly caught fire, causing panic in the entire residential area
until after 10:00 a.m. This morning,
the police just finished examining the scene
and are investigating to clarify the cause of the incident.
Fire broke out at around 10 p.m. on February 23.
People saw a fire break out in
a fabric warehouse located in alley 107, Lien
Khu 45 street, Binh Huong ward, Hoa B district, Binh
Tan district. At this time, the fabric warehouse door was closed at the
time of the fire.  In the warehouse, there was
no one to receive the news. The
fire fighting team of area 4, bc07,
Ho Chi Minh City Police, sent vehicles and
officers to the scene. The
fire fighting and
rescue police team of the district police.  Binh Tan then also
appeared to coordinate in fighting the fire. More than 30 minutes later,
the fire was basically under control. The
authorities protected the surrounding houses
from burning. Lan recorded at the
scene that the fabric warehouse was about 400 square meters wide.  The
frame of the machine covering the
top collapsed, many properties inside were burned down. At
about 2:50 this morning, a
fire broke out at Tan's house in
Quynh alley, Quynh Loi ward, Hai Ba Trung district,
Hanoi city.  The fire had three
people trapped inside the house. Upon

Hanoi City Police Command Information Center
mobilized four fire trucks and 30

and the police.  Hoang Kiem district arrived at

about 3:54 minutes the fire was under

prevented fire and
rescue rescue rescued three people from the
fire safely.  including two people on the second floor and
one person on the third floor including a
6-month-old child. The health condition
of the victims is stable. The area where the fire will occur
is on the first floor of the house. The
cause of the damage is being investigated.
Last night on the Ho Chi
Minh City - Trung Luong highway, through Ben
Luc district, Long An province, there was a
traffic accident between a truck and a
pickup truck.  Fortunately, the accident did not cause any
casualties, but the vehicle was
damaged and caused traffic congestion for
several kilometers.
Accordingly, the truck was traveling on the
highway from Ho Chi Minh City
to Tien Giang.  While the car was passing through a
section in Ben Luc district,
Long An province, it suddenly collided with a pickup truck that was
traveling on the road. The
collision caused the pickup truck to be
pushed and turned in the opposite direction.  After
the accident, the pickup truck was stuck
between the truck and the median strip,
occupying the entire first lane,
causing traffic congestion for several kilometers
on the next lane at around 3 a.m. on
May 24.  Two cars were

Giang to Ho Chi Minh City when they just

Binh Chanh district, Ho Chi
Minh City.  Minh suddenly collided and climbed onto the
concrete pavement at the toll station. The
management unit of the
Ho Chi Minh City - Trung Luong Expressway was informed and
promptly arrived at the scene to regulate
traffic and investigate the cause.

discovered catching slack Lining is
a sport of balancing on a
rope centered in a valley or
on water. A world champion athlete has
just added more difficulty to
this sport.  when he didn't walk but slid on
the wire athlete jn rose took on the
challenge on a wire stretched
across the frozen vaste falls in his home country
estonia which is also the highest waterfall
in the baltic region the wire was stretched across
50 m high, 50 m long,
14 degree slope to be able to slide on the rope Rose
had to wear socks, not just one pair but
five pairs in the performance part, the
maximum speed Rose achieved was 22
km  /h John Rose, 32 years old, started his
slack Lining career at the age of 18 and has been a three-time
world champion. He has also set
many world records in this sport,
including the SL Lining record at an altitude of 185 m in
Qatar last year Rose also
completed a 500m slack lining
in Kazakhstan and the
world's longest slack lining of 580m

2024 Paris Olympics will be  Made

LP, a French company founded in

Paris
2024 Olympic Games host company plans to use 100 tons of
